column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Police forces on a local patrol in Prek Takong Village
column6: detained one suspect for trafficking of narcotics at 17:30 on 13 May 2019.------The suspect was named as Huy Chan Sarath
column10: Phnom Penh.------Disposable items include: 5 packages of drugs
column11: 1 small bag and 1 tuk tuk.------The suspect was taken to the Meanchey municipal police station to build a case file.------The suspect ------previously appeared in the news------ after he was robbed of a phone in July.
